meanings.sent1: She tripped and fell, floundering on the ground.
meanings.sent2: The injured bird was floundering in the bushes.
meanings.sent3: The puppy kept floundering around in circles, chasing its tail.
meanings.sent4: The lost hiker was floundering in the dense forest, unable to find a way out.
meanings.sent5: The swimmer was floundering in the rough waves, desperately trying to stay afloat.

meanings.sent1: The floundering toddler tried to walk but kept stumbling.
meanings.sent2: The floundering clown tripped over his own oversized shoes.
meanings.sent3: The floundering penguin waddled awkwardly on the ice.
meanings.sent4: The floundering robot bumped into walls as it tried to navigate the room.
meanings.sent5: The floundering dancer struggled to keep up with the choreography, causing a few stumbles.

meanings.sent1: The floundering business was unable to attract customers.
meanings.sent2: The floundering student couldn't grasp the concept despite trying hard.
meanings.sent3: The floundering chef burnt the dish and had to start over.
meanings.sent4: The floundering team lost every match in the tournament.
